name: Duck. My. Life.
description:
A duck themed beat-em-up where you play as a duck and beat up chickens and loan sharks. 

WASD to move, F to bite the heck out of everything in your way.

Enjoy the quirky story of Bubb's daily work life that may or may not involve a magical mushroom and lots of ducking around.
